duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide highly professional and technical nursing care to critically ill and premature infants in the NICU.
Use the nursing process for patient care, including assessment, planning, implementation, and evaluation.
Direct and supervise other team members, collaborating with multidisciplinary team members to provide age/developmentally appropriate care.
Communicate clearly and openly to promote a collaborative environment.
Be engaged and eager to build a winning team within the NICU.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of professional nursing. BSN Preferred.
